channel.title: CVE Feed for Open Asset Import Library -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open Asset Import Library -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-45679|2024-09-18T03:35:30.462Z -- open%20asset%20import%20library -- assimp
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.3 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by importing a specially crafted file into the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-40724|2024-07-19T14:55:17.620Z -- open%20asset%20import%20library -- assimp
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.2 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by inputting a specially crafted file into the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-40724|2024-07-19T07:38:28.057Z -- open%20asset%20import%20library -- assimp
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.2 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by inputting a specially crafted file into the product.

item.title: CVE-2024-40724|2024-08-02T04:33:11.893Z -- open%20asset%20import%20library -- assimp
item.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.2 allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by inputting a specially crafted file into the product.
